[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”center_left” hover_enabled=”0″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” background_color=”#0C71C3″ sticky_enabled=”0″ module_alignment=”center” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” hover_enabled=”0″ box_shadow_style=”preset2″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/ipad-directory-halfb.png” alt=”iPad displaying Worldwide Brands wholesaler directory free preview interface” title_text=”Image 1 Free Preview” align=”center” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”81%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-37px||-27px|182px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” custom_margin=”|||0px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Worldwide Brands Reviews
What are people saying about Worldwide Brands?

Since 1999 we have been finding the absolute BEST Wholesalers for
online retailers to work with. We take a tremendous amount of pride
in our Wholesaler Directory and of course we feel like it’s the best…
but what do other people think?

Check out what others have to say about us below!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-54px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Mary G” job_title=”Member Since 2021″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/0-764534cc-db4a-4f8f-9626-fef3d557dcbe-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I’m happy to provide a Worldwide Brands Review! So far I’m pleased. I’m receiving much information and I appreciate that it’s at no extra cost. My emails, so far, have been responded to very quickly. That’s another thumbs up from me. It’s rewarding to know that this is a lifetime membership with no extra fees here and there. Five stars from me!”

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Charles” job_title=”Member Since 2016″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/new-portrait-2-800×800-1-800×800.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“Thanks to Worldwide Brands for helping me find the right niche, three years ago. My gross sales for 2021 were over $90,000. Looking to do even more this year with the launch of my own website and new suppliers that I found at Worldwide Brands. With all the scammers out there, it sure is good to be able to count on 1 reliable source.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Henry” job_title=”Member Since 2003″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/1-3119bcaf-6060-4e60-9411-1430272f00e6-512×512.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I would just like to thank Worldwide Brands for the incredible information you have provided the public on your site. After reading over every inch of information you have provided for free I already felt you had earned the money for your Directory. Once I bought it, it only got better! It’s hard to find honest people on the net and I must have hit the nail on the head with you.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Cheryl” job_title=”Member Since 2007″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/2-b6607cb8-860d-4a3e-9601-51dc5d8813a2-512×512.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I am very happy and thankful to be a lifetime member of Worldwide Brands. WorldwideBrands has saved me so much time, research, stress and effort and has allowed me to expedite my business activities. Their lifetime membership plan is well worth the money. Thank you WorldwideBrands.com for the amazing research that you do to assist my daily business operations.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Jennifer” job_title=”Member Since 2005″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/new-portrait-5-800×800-1-800×800.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I am a fan of Worldwide Brands! For any new readers, Worldwide Brands has been in business for over 20 years providing a real Directory of Dropshippers and Wholesalers. No bells and whistles. Just excellent information that never goes out of style. I started using the Worldwide Brands Directory in 2005 to sell products on eBay. I was doing a good job and making money until other sellers discovered my niche and drove me out of business. I didn’t know a lot of things back then about business and since it was just a side business I just decided to stop. But I kept my Worldwide Brands Lifetime Membership all this time and I STILL can access and find lots of suppliers to work with. I started listing for things for sale on eBay again and now Amazon! I’m just getting started again, so there is some trial and error in finding the right things to sell. But first and foremost I was SUPER impressed that I could immediately access my Directory membership and immediately find suppliers to work with without having to try to go off and find legitimate ones myself. Thank you Worldwide Brands! I was a fan for years, but now I’m a SUPERFAN!”

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Mainard” job_title=”Member Since 2006″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/1-979922dd-432b-49f6-ad71-8137adbbb6d3-512×512.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“After an absence of several years, I signed onto the website today and found that not only are you still here and that my account is still intact and you recognized me, but that you have made so many wonderful improvements to the site!

I admit I was a little skeptical about my “lifetime membership” early on, but am glad to see that everything you advertised initially is true. Am so glad you are here and will be of help in starting my online business. Thank you.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Brent” job_title=”Member Since 2003″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/0-987470cd-6cdb-4bd4-b8cb-32a162061b54-512×512.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I have subscribed to your directory and have been very pleased with the information given. Thank you for your time and continued efforts. The new store I am building wouldn’t have been possible without your guide. I owe a lot of my success to your product. It gave me the info I would have never found without it. I still continue to search for wholesale suppliers on a regular basis but the ones I use from your product don’t show up on searches and would have otherwise gone unseen.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Kristin” company_name=”Member Since 2001″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/3-e368c461-53b8-4da9-a7a3-c9832162aac5-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I just want to say THANK YOU! Your directory is amazing. I purchased several other directories – before I was fortunate enough to stumble upon your site – and without exception, all of them have turned out to be scams.

After reading through the information on your web site, I decided to purchase your product. Of course, having been misled several times, I was a little nervous. Not to worry. I was thrilled when I accessed the site for the first time. There was much smiling and squealing involved. I am extremely impressed; it is every bit as fabulous as you claim.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Craig” job_title=”Member Since 2005″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/1-1fdcd4a1-d39c-4410-82bf-6b67abf81835-512×512.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I just want to say that I am amazingly impressed by your site. I have spent more hours than you can possibly imagine (well maybe you could) searching for sources of wholesale, surplus, drop shippers, etc., researching and buying money-making schemes and directories, and basically wading through monstrous piles of BS to find a few useful pieces of information. I have found a few other sites or programs with a decent amount of good information, but there’s always a lot of scandal and junk thrown in with the good stuff.

I have been doing this for years and your site is the first and only one I have ever found is completely 100% legit, extremely helpful, professionally designed & maintained, and with quick & courteous customer service. Keep up the excellent work and know that you have made the miracle of ECommerce even more miraculous than it was already.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”J.D” job_title=”Member Since 2005″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/new-portrait-4-800×800-1-800×800.jpg” module_class=”pa-toggle-testimonial” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“We have forged an alliance with several of the drop ship companies on the site and are extremely pleased with the results. We highly encourage the small and medium size internet or brick-and-mortar establishments to seriously consider a membership to Worldwide Brands.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Sammy” job_title=”Member Since 2003″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/1-e910e813-f9c2-4ff8-812d-1648a001a4f7-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I almost fell flat on my face with many of the scam artists out there. There are so many it’s unbelievable!!!! I’m taking this very slowly and trying to learn and get use to the process of building a store online. I am a member of your directory and I think it’s super! . Anyways I’m glad I stumbled on to your site. God Bless you and your unselfishness to help other people.

Your very gratified member.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Scott H” job_title=”Member Since 2005″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/0-324e7a82-45a8-4dca-bbdf-4f86736bd3cd-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I just wanted to let you know that I am currently using (one of your distributors) for my drop shipping orders. I think they are the best company that I could ever have asked for. They allow you to order online with real time updates. They have lots of different products from such a wide spread. I have contacted my rep for myself here and she is very pleasant. They are nothing but helpful.

They don’t even charge me for drop shipping because about 100% of my orders are being drop shipped and they also don’t charge me a fee for having a low priced order. Again they are great and I just wanted it to be heard. I still cannot remember how I ever stumbled onto your website, but sure glad I did. Keep up the great work!!”

[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Rex” job_title=”Member Since 2007″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/2-ed562264-a7db-457d-9fd2-90ac85730b30-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“I’ve used Worldwide Brands successfully with a past website I had. Due to life events, that website was wiped out. I have started a new grocery delivery website, here in Wisconsin that will definitely rely on Worldwide Brands to open up ways and ideas to sell and help people.

Worldwide Brands is a good investment. It seemed a large price at the time, but it ends up being a source I come back to time after time always looking for product and ideas. Money well spent.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Karen” job_title=”Member Since 2019″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/0-ebc13b6b-e66e-4d7b-bfa0-531acf9e4a92-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“The live chat reps were helpful and polite. I got my queries answered quickly and to my satisfaction. I have now joined and am looking forward to starting my online business and continuing a good relationship with this company! Thank you!”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Kevin P” job_title=”Member Since 2014″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/0-c695b791-b6dc-4637-b0f0-40e174fd5dce-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_font_size=”15px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“Worldwide Brands, I have not been on here for a while, but wanted to tell you at the upgrade on the site is fantastic. It makes me want to start selling again. Keep up the good work.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Laura T” job_title=”Member Since 2006″ portrait_url=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/3-a21898ab-377f-4892-aee0-728618c5d445-512×512.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″ body_font_size=”15px”]

“I signed up for a lifetime account back in 2006. I found a perfect wholesaler to carry on my online business successfully for four years. I then sold that business. I didn’t feel like I wanted to get back into online sales until I learned more about Fulfillment By Amazon. Suddenly, I remembered I had a lifetime account!

I was so excited to see all the updates on the distributor list. I know who works with Amazon sellers and who doesn’t. I just found my first supplier for my FBA account. I wish I had looked into it sooner, but you know what they say. The best time to plant a tree is twenty years ago, but the second best time is now! Plus, I made my money back on my lifetime account for Worldwide Brands years ago. It felt like I was getting information for free. I’m so excited to get started, thank you Worldwide Brands.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px”]

Not a Member Yet?

If you sell products online (or want to start doing it) then we don’t just invite you to be a Member…you should be a Member! We truly are the only source you will ever need for wholesale products.

Our Member’s enjoy…

•  Access to Suppliers with Millions of Wholesale Products

•  FREE Weekly Updates (New Suppliers Added Weekly!)

•  Wholesalers at the TOP of the Supply Chain

•  Certified to be 100% Genuine Wholesalers. No Middlemen

•  Safe. Secure. Dropshipping

•  Keep More Profits! NO Monthly Fees. No Annual Fees.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/order-now/” button_text=”JOIN TODAY” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#E09900″ button_border_radius=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worldwidebrands.com/nws/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/monitor_for-right_showing-wholesaler-directory.png” alt=”desktop computer showing the wholesale directory” title_text=”monitor_for right_showing wholesaler directory” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-51px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
